rdf:Description.lla:note: No ship called Elizabeth Barclay found registered in Thurso, but one found in some other ports.
No Hope found to have been registered in Leith but there are ones registered in many other ports.
Wales given as port of registration on original document . There are several ships named Pilgrim having been registered in many different ports in Wales and other countries.
Wales given as port of registration on original document . There are several ships named Pilgrim having been registered in many different ports in Wales and other countries.
No ships registered in Bude but some of this name registered in other ports.
Wales given as port of registration on original document . There are several ships named Pilgrim having been registered in many different ports in Wales and other countries.
No ship called Thomas registered in Newport but there was a Thomas and Elizabeth and a Thomas Powell registered there.
No ship called Thomas registered in Newport but there was a Thomas and Elizabeth and a Thomas Powell registered there.
No ship of that name found registered in Liverpool.
